com.rift.coad.util.transaction
Class TransactionManager

java.lang.Object
  com.rift.coad.util.transaction.TransactionManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.transaction.xa.XAResource
public class TransactionManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.transaction.xa.XAResource

This object is responsible for managing the transactions for a group of objects.

Nested Class Summary
 class TransactionManager.Transaction
          The transaction object, responsible for managing an individual transaction.
